text: The XG8 Javelin is a Ship-Launched Fighter manufactured by Ram Tah, produced from 3304 to the present. It is featured in Elite Dangerous: Horizons and costs 15,270 CR. The Javelin is an all-rounder with Guardian weaponry, slightly slower than the F63 Condor and less manoeuvrable than the Gu-97, but with substantial damage output, especially against Thargoid craft.

The XG8 Javelin has dimensions of 13.5m x 14.2m x 12.9m, with an armour rating of 10 and shields of 30 MJ. It has a top speed of 316 m/s and a boost speed of 541 m/s. The Javelin has 3 weapon mounts and 0 utility mounts.

The XG8 Javelin's Shard Launcher has the highest potential damage-per-shot (133) of all three Guardian hybrid fighters, but its slow-moving projectiles make it difficult to use, limiting its range. However, it has the highest DPS of any fighter, making it effective against larger, slower targets.

During combat against a Thargoid Interceptor, its Thargon Swarms will prioritise any Ship-Launched Fighters in the area and quickly destroy them. Eliminate as many Thargon Swarms as possible before deploying a SLF to allow it focus on Thargoid ships unimpeded.
